name: WebGL2RenderingContext.getUniformIndices
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.getUniformIndices() method of the WebGL 2 API retrieves the indices of a number of uniforms within a WebGLProgram.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getUniformIndices' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
